attributes.action: Return Nurse training to Hospitals and GP Practices
attributes.additional_details:
Many people now do Nursing just to get a degree and not to be a Nurse. Let us return to Nurse training in Schools of Nursing and encourage those who want to become a nurse to nurse not only those with countless GCSE'S and A levels who want a degree.
Nursing standards of care are declining. Let us give Nursing back to those who care.
